name: Ocean Horizon
description:
Ocean Horizon is a game made by one person ( on this occasion)  exclusively for

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

In this experience, we are born as a small sea turtle that must travel the stretch that separates it from the ocean.

Live that moment and look at the world from another perspective.
